description.value:
Your litany rails against the sin of wrath, punishing the target for attacking good creatures. The target must attempt a Will save. A particularly wrathful creature, such as a wrath demon, uses the outcome one degree of success worse than the result of its saving throw. The target then becomes temporarily immune to all of your litanies for 1 minute.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The first time the target uses an action that deals damage to at least one creature without the shadow trait, the target takes 3d6 holy damage.

Failure Each time the target uses an action that deals damage to at least one creature without the shadow trait, the target takes 3d6 holy damage.

Critical Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2}. Each time it uses an action that deals damage to at least one creature without the shadow trait, the target takes 3d6 holy damage.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d6.
